abstract: Stephen Crowley recently shared images from his Instagram account of President Obama’s trip to India and Saudi Arabia. According to Mr. Crowley, filing live pictures wasn’t easy.
snippet: Stephen Crowley recently shared images from his Instagram account of President Obama’s trip to India and Saudi Arabia. According to Mr. Crowley, filing live pictures wasn’t easy.

headline.main: Coverage in an Instant: In the Field With @crowleygraph
